com.gratex.perconik.activity.ide.listeners

Class IdeDocumentListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.AbstractRegistrable
      • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.Adapter
        • com.gratex.perconik.activity.ide.listeners.IdeListener
          • com.gratex.perconik.activity.ide.listeners.IdeDocumentListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.core.filebuffers.IFileBufferListener, org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceChangeListener, org.eclipse.ui.ISelectionListener, FilteringListener<ResourceEventType>, Listener, EditorListener, FileBufferListener, ResourceListener, SelectionListener, Registrable

    public final class IdeDocumentListener
extends IdeListener
implements EditorListener, FileBufferListener, ResourceListener, SelectionListener
    A listener of IdeDocumentOperation events. This listener creates IdeDocumentOperationDto data transfer objects and passes them to the Activity Watcher Service to be transferred into the User Activity Client Application for further processing.

    TODO document how DTOs are build and what data they contain

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell
